marriageMeaning: Romance isn’t ungodly—marital desire can be holy and bonding.
prayerPrompt: Lord, help us enjoy each other with honor and joy.
actionPrompt: Send a flirty-but-honoring message + schedule 20 minutes tonight.

marriageMeaning: Tone matters. Soft starts prevent unnecessary damage.
prayerPrompt: God, help our words bring peace.

marriageMeaning: What you dwell on shapes your relationship.
prayerPrompt: Help me guard my mind and protect our oneness.

marriageMeaning: Temptation isn’t unbeatable—there’s always an exit.
prayerPrompt: God, show me the way of escape and strengthen my will.
actionPrompt: Choose your exit plan: block, leave, call spouse, pray.
